title: 8 Seconds (1994) Luke Perry [The Bull Riding World Champion]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109021/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109021/</a>

6 years before he appeared in Beverly Hills 90210, Luke Perry starred in this heartwarming tale of Oklahoma bull rider Lane Frost. Hard work and faith led Frost to winning the 1987 PRCA Bull Riding World Championship.

For those who don't know, 8 seconds is the length of time one has to remain on the back of bucking bull in the riding event at a rodeo.

This is not my rip. I found this torrent on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here. 

DVDrip fullscreen 464x352, good stereo sound.

Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
